Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Boss_BaseFightValue
Text.DisplayName: Sage Physical Training Starting Stats in Battle

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Boss_Atk
Text.Desc: This person's secret body is incredibly powerful that it can break stones and overturn oceans.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Boss_Def
Text.Desc: This person's secret body is so tough that nothing can break through it.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Boss_Dodge
Text.Desc: This person is very agile and swift that no one is able to catch them.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Boss_CatchFabao
Text.Desc: This person has very skilled hands and excels at suppressing artifacts.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Boss_ArmorPenetration
Text.Desc: This person is very smart with their power and excels at penetrating Qi barriers and dealing damage.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Boss_Strong
Text.Desc: This person's physical body is very strong and their mind is also resilient that no pain deters them.
